5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ka'b b. 'Ujra reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There are certain ejaculations, the repeaters of which or the performers of which after every prescribed prayer will never be caused disappointment:" Glory be to Allah" thirty-three times." Praise be to Allah" thirty-three times, and" Allah is most Great" thirty-four times

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ وَبَيَان صِفَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to recite statements of remembrance after the prayer, and how that is to be done
